articles.title: Brooke Shields Praises 'Caring' 'Pretty Baby' Costar Over Kiss at 11 - Insider
articles.description: In the 1978 film, Shields had her very first kiss with her 28-year-old costar Keith Carradine, who she has praised for being "protective and caring."
articles.content:
Brooke Shields has praised her "Pretty Baby" costar who reassured her that the kiss they shared on camera when she was 11 years old didn't "count" as her first kiss.
